Articles.Content:
KSP Version:1.1.3.1289 (x64) Steam install

What Happens: I have do a rendezvous with a vessel in orbit of kerbin docking a clamp-O-tron Sr. to another clamp-O-tron Sr.

The 2nd ship was to provide fuel to burn the first in to the mun.

When I try to decouple that is no way do that.

Mods / Add-Ons: No mods

Steps to Replicate: Launch "NEW BIG I ORE II" to orbit - notes: first stage could be full reusable if launched vertically until separation. Then burn remaining ship horizontally until reach safty orbit and then swap control to the 1st stage and land it ([key1] open all "service bay" 2.5 and [key2] deploy all parachutes. swap again to the main ship and discard all empty orange via clamp-o-tron Sr. (could be landed to if you want).

Then launch "NEW BIG I POWER" to rendezvous with "NEW BIG I ORE II".

I think all files needed are below in "My save folder"

Result: After docking the clamp-o-tron Sr. wont separate any more...

Fixes/Workarounds:

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

My save folder: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B6vfOB0gpAIbUVdBXzd1VHJ0aVE

The laste save in v1.1.3 is named "clamp-O-tron" and the vessel is named "NEW BIG I ORE II Ship"

http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/266091945763143820/FB440C5540A818E0A72BAE8FFFD385B27AC35AF5/

After press "Undock" the "Undock" button do not appear any more and the vessel is steel together ... I think is a new bug never happen with me before.

http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/266091945763188367/78398B88307C7D356E9A3F10FDDE9D6863460F2B/

I hope this is useful. Sorry if I couldn't be more specific. English is a lot hard to me.

Identical problem hear

Edited June 25, 2016 by Xico R.
